Name: Kinda Heroes: The cutest RPG ever!
About the game: Kinda Heroes is a classic medieval RPG made by one indie guy, but with love! Welcome to Riverstone - a tiny medieval village in the middle of nowhere! This place hasnâ€™t seen any heroes yet. Choose a character and begin your adventure! Upgrade combat and cooking skills, complete quests, rescue Woody and become a real hero! The Steam Awards 2020 nominee: Outstanding Visual Style Award Indie Cup S'20 nominee: Best Mobile Game Game Development World Championship 2020 (GDWC) participant KEY FEATURES Classic medieval RPG Stand-up gameplay Tiny build size, no DLC Offline gameplay, no Internet access is required Exciting story 8 different heroes with unique combat style Switch heroes at any time and use common inventory Advanced mechanics based on movesets and timings Craft and augmentation system Cooking Tons of equipment Unique skills Various quests Monsters and bosses, each with unique features and movesets
